content: crochet a cute little whale with this quick and easy pattern the best part there s no sewing involved the finished amigurumi no-sew whales are the perfect size for keychains and are great for selling at markets the pdf includes detailed instructions and photos as well as easy print pages for more advanced crocheters or for a printed hard copy the free written pattern can be found ** here 1 ** on my blog **materials** * dk weight yarn * 2 5mm crochet hook * 6mm safety eyes * polyester fiberfill * yarn needle stitch marker scissors the finished item measure approximately 2 5 6 5cm x 2 5cm item size may vary depending on the materials used 1 https //www stitchbyfay com/no-sew-whale-crochet-pattern/
